page.title: 18A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ANNE
page.content: I got up at 8.00a.m. And got into my dungarees and jumper. My breakfast of shreddies,toast and peanut butter with a drink of blackcurrant juice was ready. After breakfast I fed the chickens then I made ginger fairling biscuits. I played with my Lego and I drew horses with my sister Claire. Later,I went outside to watch dad at work and talked to our goat called 'Pookie snack n' Burger'.Claire and I went for a walk and then went to see the rabbits before our lunch of beans on toast and cakes. After lunch I planted some calendula flowers and then we played badminton.It was soon tea-time we had 'shepherds'pie then cherries with yogurt and coca-cola.We watched the Eurovision Song contest on television and went to bed at 10.30p.m which was late for me! Anne Deeming.
